means: <希神>普里阿摩斯（特洛伊末代国君）

sentence.Network_en: A Trojan prince, the eldest son of Priam , killed by Achilles.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫克托耳:特洛伊王子, 普里阿摩斯的长子, 被阿喀琉斯杀死.

sentence.Network_en: After Paris died in battle she became the wife of another son of Priam.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕利斯战死后,她成了皮安姆国王另一个儿子的妻子.

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) the last king of Troy; father of Hector and Paris and Cassandra
